subject_information.comments: A description of the words "objective" and "subjective" in the description or on the question pages would have been helpful
We would be interested in any comments you have about this task
the words were confusing but was able to scale through
I forgot that objective is factual
I looked up the definition of subjective and objective just to be sure how this related to these questions. To answer the questions, I found it would be a matter of perspective, not emotions.

I felt the task was straightforward, and the survey seemed to work fine.  I found some of the wording strange (wordy) like saying not happy rather than unhappy, but perhaps that was deliberate.  Good luck with your research!
interesting way of asking the questions
